snippet: Anniversary campaigns are part of a trend that could be called comfort marketing, using memories of the past to woo consumers into buying products in the present.
abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column notes that several big brands are celebrating anniversaries in 2012, and are using the occasion to roll out nostalgic campaigns that could be called 'comfort marketing.'
lead_paragraph: Anniversary campaigns are part of a trend that could be called comfort marketing, using memories of the past to woo consumers into buying products in the present.
